name: Off the rails (Trying to code...)
description:
wasd to move

shift to break

r to restart

(press a car before pressing start button in order to play)

I made this game in about 2 weeks, along with my friend chococroissant2

He made the 3d assets meanwhile I did the programing and music, thanks for playing and hope you find it fun.

(if you find any bugs, make sure to leave a comment)

Honorable mentions:

Isaiah (made the start button)

Dean (tried to make music)
